# <a name="read-receipts"></a><span data-ttu-id="aec5b-102">Okundu bilgilerini gönderme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="aec5b-102">Read receipts</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="aec5b-103">Okundu veya ileti için teslim bilgisi istemek için:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="aec5b-103">To request a read receipt or a delivery receipt for your message:</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="aec5b-104">Üç nokta seçin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="aec5b-104">Select the three dots</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' />
 <span data-ttu-id="aec5b-105">İletinin en üstündeki bölmesi oluşturun.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="aec5b-105">at the top of the message compose pane.</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="aec5b-106">**İleti Seçenekleri Göster**' i seçin.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="aec5b-106">Select **Show message options**.</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="aec5b-107">**Okundu bilgisi istemek** veya **teslim edildiğinde**veya her ikisini seçin.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="aec5b-107">Select **Request a read receipt** or **Request a delivery receipt**, or both.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="aec5b-108">Outlook okundu bilgisi isteklerini nasıl tepki vereceğini belirlemek için Git</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="aec5b-108">To choose how Outlook responds to read receipt requests, go to</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' />
 <span data-ttu-id="aec5b-109">**Ayarları** > **tüm Outlook ayarları görüntülemek** > **ileti işleme**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="aec5b-109">**Settings** > **View all Outlook settings** > **Message handling**.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="aec5b-110">Daha fazla bilgi için bkz: [web Outlook'ta okundu](https://support.office.com/article/e09af74d-3519-45fc-a680-37a538a92157).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="aec5b-110">For more information, see [Read receipts in Outlook on the web](https://support.office.com/article/e09af74d-3519-45fc-a680-37a538a92157).</span></span>
